about_the_game:
Spectacular continuation to the acclaimed Royal Romances game series! What can a human do in a desperate situation or for the chance for unfathomable power and love? The murky air becomes heavier and harder to breathe, monsters roam the forest, and dark magic taint smothers everything within its reach. Ida and Illeon are about to strike, fulfilling their devious plan. Face battles with your people, find love and endure loss as you get ready to defend the lands from mortal threat! Can a simple bard defeat a monstrous werewolf? Can a villain change its nature? Answers to these questions in this pulse-pounded new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

💋 Unexpected plot twists!
Explore a fabulous fantasy world full of unexpected heroes and spectacular sceneries! Can you catch and defeat your enemy and still remain human? Is there any chance of a happy ending for the evil witch? To answer these questions you need to embark on an unforgettable journey with the heroes of the fantasy story!

💋 Difficult decisions!
You have the opportunity to influence the plot of the point and click adventure. Make a fateful decision, on which the development of the romance story depends. Can you help the characters and save the day like a true hero before it’s too late? Better think twice!

💋 A variety of achievements!
Unique riddles, intricate puzzles and relaxing mini-games are waiting for you! Solve brain teasers and find hidden objects to earn numerous achievements and highlight your success!

💋 Collectible items!
Immerse yourself in the magical atmosphere of this adventure! Multiple picturesque locations with mysteries for you to solve and secrets to find. Keep an eye out for many different collectibles to make the game even more exciting to play!
